post.text: Truly honored to receive the first ever presidential endorsement from the Bay of Pigs Veterans Association. #MAGA #ImWithYou

comment.author: Allyson
comment.text: I can't believe some people going to vote for someone as weak as Hilary Clinton. She wasn't even strong enough to leave her husband who cheated on her multiple times, how on earth would she be able to stand up against Kim Jong Un or Putin?

replies.author: Garrett
replies.text: They have an open marriage. She's cheated too. Really despicable.

replies.author: Savannah
replies.text: But Donald Trump cheating on both his former wives is not despicable. Could you be more hypocritical?

replies.author: Derek
replies.text: Lol! But you'll vote for Trump who has, himself, cheated on his ALL his wives. AND who blamed Billy Bush for bullying him into saying those disgusting comments. If he can't stand up to a third - tier tv personality, how's he supposed to stand up to Putin?!
